abstracts.cdata!:
The main purpose of the Development
            Learning Center Project is to test the effectiveness and
            sustainability of a Development Learning Center (DLC) in
            Mali as part of a global knowledge-sharing network to
            strengthen the capacity of public, private, and civil
            society decision makers to design, plan, and manage social
            and economic development programs.
